Table	Create Table
task_shares	CREATE TABLE `task_shares` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `taskId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `sharedWithUserId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `sharedByUserId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `permission` enum('viewer','editor') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'viewer',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_task_user` (`taskId`,`sharedWithUserId`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
